name: Psychotherapeutic Rehabilitation Services, INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Psychotherapeutic Rehabilitation Services, INC is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Mental Illness provider based in Landover, MD. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $14.8M in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $14.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
